name: Bug Builder
description:
Bug Builder
 Your own evolving bug colony Buttons

Random - get a random bug
Shop - shop for bugs
Delete & Earn - get money for deleting bugs
Powers - get better things
--random - better random bugs
--earn - more money when deleting
--death - more money when bugs die
Move - get a different place
--grass
--water
--snow
--space

Natural Disasters

Mass Extiction

Blizzard
Time warp
Crazy Infestation

Game Jam!

This game is part of this game jam:
https://itch.io/jam/scratch-jam-2018

Also, there is an easter egg...
